Topic.Title: Please try our new demo! (we've spent a long time writing the stories)

Posts.EditableText: Here's the link to the demo, please leave some feedback!
Posts.HTML: Here's the link to the demo, please leave some feedback!

Posts.EditableText: Be careful of typos/grammar errors.  FYI.
Thanks! Did you see any that we may have missed?
Posts.HTML: Thanks! Did you see any that we may have missed?

Posts.EditableText: I placed a comment on the game's page. I will test it a little more.
Posts.HTML: I placed a comment on the game's page. I will test it a little more.

Posts.EditableText: Again, if your not satisfied with the current demo, we understand, as we were forced to release it before it was ready due to Thanks Giving being right around the corner and therefore lacks sufficient content, we hope to release the full demo after Thanks Giving
Posts.HTML: Again, if your not satisfied with the current demo, we understand, as we were forced to release it before it was ready due to Thanks Giving being right around the corner and therefore lacks sufficient content, we hope to release the full demo after Thanks Giving

Posts.EditableText: It is not a matter of be satisfied or not. Just reported that ending was quite sudden and blank. Other endings has some words about development and the like. Perhaps you should ensure all endings has the same explanations about the project and perspectives.
Posts.HTML: It is not a matter of be satisfied or not. Just reported that ending was quite sudden and blank. Other endings has some words about development and the like. Perhaps you should ensure all endings has the same explanations about the project and perspectives.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks for your feedback, would you mind telling us which of the endings are blank? We can seem to find them (it might also be that we fixed that already and have forgot to publish an update)
Posts.HTML: Thanks for your feedback, would you mind telling us which of the endings are blank? We can seem to find them (it might also be that we fixed that already and have forgot to publish an update)

Posts.EditableText: I played a farmer girl who insisted to remain at bed.
